headline: Why Palantir Technologies (PLTR) Is Down 7.3% After Surging AI Adoption And New Cognizant Partnership – And What's Next
summary: In early February 2026, Palantir Technologies reported past fourth-quarter and full-year 2025 results showing sharply higher revenue and net income, issued optimistic 2026 guidance, and was highlighted for rapid adoption of its Artificial Intelligence Platform across U.S. government and commercial clients. Separately, Cognizant announced a recent partnership to embed Palantir Foundry and AIP into its TriZetto healthcare business, underscoring Palantir’s push into complex, highly regulated...

headline: Palantir, (PLTR) Cognizant Partner to Accelerate AI-Driven Healthcare Modernization
summary: Palantir Technologies Inc. (NASDAQ:PLTR) is one of the worst AI stocks to invest in according to Reddit. On February 5, Cognizant Technology Solutions (NASDAQ:CTSH) announced a partnership with Palantir Technologies to accelerate AI-driven modernization across healthcare and enterprise operations. The collaboration will integrate Palantir Foundry and the Palantir AIP with Cognizant’s TriZetto healthcare business and […]

headline: Consumer Tech News (Feb 2-6): Big Tech Earnings Take Center Stage In U.S. Markets, Anthropic Launches New AI Tool & More
summary: U.S. markets react to Elon Musk's legal setback, major tech earnings beats, and accelerating AI and semiconductor investments across global markets.

headline: Microsoft Vs. Micron: A Look At The Rotation Into Memory
summary: Memory, especially High Bandwidth Memory, plays an important role in ensuring AI workloads run efficiently and fast, reducing latency. Read more here.
